content.raw:
We are now focused on developing the tools needed to communicate over low bandwidth connections.  Can you provide the details of the traffic control that will be used?
Is it going to use the numbers in the rules as a ceiling and floor, with some distribution across those values?  Or is it going to be more like the VRC, with a total number of bits for the run?  Also, is the bit rate based on sim time or wall-clock time?  Can you provide the actual tc parameters?  It is hard to design our communication tools without knowing exactly what we need to design to.
